meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> of the <radical>mountain</radical> <radical>turkey</radical>s is our <kanji>sponsor</kanji>. He's paying us to say and type everything you're reading.
readingMnemonic: This same <kanji>sponsor</kanji> is also how you made your <reading>cy</reading>borg (さい). You didn't think you were able to get all those body parts yourself, did you? No no, the leader of the mountain turkeys sponsored you so you could do your experiments.
